meanings.definition: A person or thing that relies on someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The baby birds were helpless reliers on their mother for food and warmth.
meanings.sent2: The team of climbers were skilled reliers on each other for safety and support.
meanings.sent3: The little robot was a cute relier on its human friend to recharge its batteries.
meanings.sent4: The old tree was a reliable relier on the sun for energy and growth.
meanings.sent5: The lost puppy became a loyal relier on the kind stranger for help and guidance.

meanings.sent1: The reliers gathered at the library for their weekly book club meeting.
meanings.sent2: The reliers in the group all shared a love for storytelling and adventure.
meanings.sent3: The reliers decided to form a band and call themselves 'The Bookworms'.
meanings.sent4: The reliers' collection of novels filled the shelves of their cozy reading nook.
meanings.sent5: The reliers enjoyed discussing their favorite books over cups of hot tea.
